name: Mahjong - Legacy of the Toltecs
description: Become the best mahjong player in the world in the great mahjong game "Mahjong Legacy of the Toltecs"! Search for an ancient, powerful artifact that will help you find incredible treasures. Overcome obstacles, collect magical mana and become a legendary adventurer. Face numerous beautifully designed levels and relax with relaxing music and great atmosphere!
